name: Luddic Refit
desc: This ship has been produced using manufacturing capabilities of Luddic Church shipyard. Use of reinforced bulkhead and reliance on lower technology  leads to a %s percent improvement in hull integrity and %s percent decrease in supply consumption. However, increase in mass induce a %s percent decrease in handling. Luddic ships also need more crew (%s/%s/%s/%s ) to compensate lacks of autonomous systems.
